website_summaries.verdict: This square griddle features a multifunction tray that keeps food warm, protects against splatters, and melts toppings.
pros: Cook surface fits a lot of food
Multi-function tray keeps food warm and doubles as a splatter shield
cons: Putting it in the dishwasher may affect nonstick coating

customer_reviews.title: Can cook a lot of pancakes and french toast at once
customer_reviews.text: This grill is a great size for pancakes and french toast. I can get 12 slices of french toast on it at a time and probably more if i put them closer together. The center portion does not seem to be as hot as the rest of the grill (things don't brown/cook as fast there) but the rest of the features make up for it. The surface is really nice and I really like the grease collection cup. Will be ordering another soon for our cabin.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Man this griddle is great. The large square work surface is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Man this griddle is great. The large square work surface is fantastic. The fact that you can tilt it to allow fat to run off is a great idea. I do wish the hole for this was a bit larger. But it is functional for sure. The drip tray was loose but i was able to bend the tabs that hold it in just a bit to keep it securely in place. The surface heats up fast and even. First time in years i have been able to make perfect pancakes 4 at a time!.
customer_reviews.author: siburmax

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this.
customer_reviews.text: This product was very disappointing. I just returned it. The design is nice (except that the power cord is way too short) and it is large but the most important thing about a griddle is to have even heating. This griddle heats a row across the top and bottom and doesn’t heat the middle. You can see from the picture above, the pancake was ready to flip on the top and bottom, but raw in the middle. A compelete failure. I don’t really know why it is so hard to include a heating element in the middle but this is worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda26

customer_reviews.title: Just received it and it's best looking griddle I've ever seen.
customer_reviews.text: Just received it and it's best looking griddle I've ever seen. It's compact but large enough to cook 4 pancakes at a time. The legs fold in and it stores easily. I'm very happy... Well, I've owned it for a year and am now tossing it in the garbage. It's impossible to clean. The non- stick disappeared quickly.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great griddle.
customer_reviews.text: We love this griddle! It is well-designed, easy-to-clean, and priced really well. My only complaint might be that the lips at the edges are a little low if you want to fry an egg... so you have to fry eggs away from the edge or they spill over. We use it a lot for breakfast sandwiches. It is large enough to toast english muffins on one side, fry eggs in the middle, and cook ham on the other side. Makes for a quick, easy breakfast.
customer_reviews.author: Will M.

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Nice size, good quality. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Where a family of seven, with many additional teenagers often hanging at our place. It has become tradition to make a big breakfast on Saturday or Sunday. When you're feeding that many mouths, you need a big griddle. This one is larger than my previous, and heats evenly throughout. The reviews that I read where people are having difficulty with the heating evenly, I believe they're not preheating it and allowing it to warm up enough. Don't turn it up high, set it to the temperature you need and give it some time. Pancakes turned out beautifully.I've been very pleased with it, and my older smaller one now lives in my RV.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Linkfield

customer_reviews.title: Good griddle with large surface.  A taller lip on the back would help with turning hash browns.
customer_reviews.text: My last griddle from another manufacturer was starting to lose it's non-stick properties after about 10 years of ownership. This one has a great non-stick surface and it's actually quite large. It does cook more evenly than most other griddles I've used as well. I suppose it wouldn't fit with the 'slimline' form but it would be more useful if it had a taller lip on the back for the food to bump against when trying to get the spatula under. I often end up with some hash browns on the counter but no problem with pancakes, french toast or eggs.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Hart

customer_reviews.title: Other then that I love it. I have always used a electric griddle
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars but doesn't quite fit on its side in my cabinet. Other then that I love it. I have always used a electric griddle. I have tried the new copper ones out and they don't seem to work like the electric ones. . It came quick I like that the legs fold.
customer_reviews.author: momofmandm

customer_reviews.title: Drop Down Legs in Back are Great but Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Used a couple times now and it is a good quality griddle. Different in that it is almost square. One feature that attracted us was the fold-down legs in the back to facilitate drainage when cooking greasy things like bacon and sausage. On the old one we propped up the back legs with whatever was handy. This works great, but they are flimsy and I can see snapping one off if you're not careful.
customer_reviews.author: Xoss

customer_reviews.title: Perfect large griddle!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this griddle! I thought it wouldn't live up to my last one from another manufacturer, but I love this one even more. Super simple to use and can fit 10 pieces of bread (grilled cheese or french toast) and ten pancakes easily. Really large cooking surface. LOVE using it... makes me happy every time... lol. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna A

customer_reviews.title: Very good griddle, despite two minor design glitches.
customer_reviews.text: Got this mainly to do pancakes, which am happy to say that this griddle does very well, cooking the pancakes evenly. The non-stick surface is just that, no hint of sticking. As one reviewer mentioned, the temp control is in an odd place and one concern of mine is the temp numbers are on a sticker glued to the control nob, not engraved as what used to be done, so in the future I can see the temp sticker eventually coming off. Despite the glitches, so far very happy with this griddle.
customer_reviews.author: William Byers

customer_reviews.title: Terrific grill
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product. Makes excellent hash brown potatoes because u can control the perfectly. Then turn down the heat for perfect eggs. Lots of room, almost like cooking on a commercial grill. Easy to wash. 4 years of regular use, actually >5x/week, it’s still in good shape. It served me so well, I felt compelled to recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great cooktop
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to cook breakfast items (eggs, bacon, pancakes...) and it has exceeded my expectations. I have an electric cook top that takes a while to heat up and this takes 1/2 the time to heat up and use. Would definitely recommend this even for just weekend use and cleanup is as easy as cleaning a pan. It folds up for storage nicely.
customer_reviews.author: jim andreae

customer_reviews.title: even though the shipping box was completely fine. Didn't even notice the corner was busted until ...
customer_reviews.text: Knocked off a star because it arrived with a corner of plastic busted, even though the shipping box was completely fine. Didn't even notice the corner was busted until after first use. Plastic actually came apart in my hand while I was washing it, like it was fractured or something. It made a great breakfast for a family of four of sausage, bacon, eggs, and pancakes.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin M.

customer_reviews.title: No Complaints
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful griddle, and the best one I've ever had. Compared to other similar griddles, it heats the most evenly and has plenty of room. Every time my husband cooks overeasy eggs with it, he says "Man, I love this griddle!". It has a man's seal of approval, and that's all it needs!
customer_reviews.author: anon ymous

customer_reviews.title: Seriously, buy this one...
customer_reviews.text: We've owned a few different brands of griddles. After owning the presto Slimline, it's the only one I'll buy from now on. We've owned it for a year now, and it works wonderfully! I cook anything from pancakes to pork steaks. Heats evenly, the non stick surface works, super easy to clean. My only complaint is the drip tray, it fits loose. not a big deal on the countertop, but it always fall out when carrying it to and from the pantry. so much that we broke ours. But replacement trays are available and cheap from Prestos website. I highly recommend this griddle!!
customer_reviews.author: dustin krueger

customer_reviews.title: Thanks bonappetit magazine for great review got one right away
customer_reviews.text: Thanks bonappetit magazine for great review got one right away. Really does its job can make a meal for up to 8 people on this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph B Martinez III

customer_reviews.title: Decent but I would like more even temperature distribution
customer_reviews.text: When making a griddle full of pancakes, I can fit 6-8 on the cooking surface and the pancakes that are in the middle come out more brown on one half than the other. The edges of the griddle in the center region are not as hot as the edges near either side. For the money, it is a good value. However, I'd gladly pay twice the price for a griddle that is more even. This one seemed to have the largest number of good reviews so I gave it a shot.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Fix-it / Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Best griddle I’ve owned
customer_reviews.text: I just used it this morning to make pancakes 🥞 & bacon 🥓 for breakfast & they were the best. I read the reviews before I ordered this & some said heat distribution was not good but mine worked great. The little legs on the side worked great to drip the bacon grease but 1 thing to do is put something underneath to keep it in place as when it’s tilted the dish slides open so not good but a way to work around it. There were some other Presto griddles less expensive but I like this one.
customer_reviews.author: Blanca Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: Way too big.
customer_reviews.text: The product was a little too big for my liking and because of how big it is the heat distribution was lacking quite a bit. With the hugeness of this griddle the cleaning process becomes a hassle too in where it was too big for my sink so I just ended up washing it down outside with a hoes which made it way more easy. I wish it was somewhat slimmer even though the name is called slimline it wasn’t slim at all and is way too big and bulky for my liking. I ended up purchasing something more compact cause who wants something big and hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: binh

customer_reviews.title: Convenient Breakfast Cooking
customer_reviews.text: I primarily use it for cooking breakfast. Large enough to cook eggs on one side, meats on the other. Relatively easy clean up, just a bit cumbersome in the sink. Kind of difficult to store away, I have it in a closet. Does not fit in any of my pantry cabinets. It is very convenient to use on Saturday or Sunday mornings.
customer_reviews.author: Wilbert Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Great Griddle
customer_reviews.text: I love this griddle. I use it mainly for pancakes and to fry bacon. I especially like the feature that allows you to tilt the griddle when frying bacon which carries the grease away. Another great feature is the fold-up legs which allows me to store it away with my bread pans and saves space. The only negative is that the heat distribution is not exactly uniform, but that is not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy Bee

customer_reviews.title: Love this griddle
customer_reviews.text: Love this griddle!!! Super slim design and large size makes this perfect for home and for our camper! Multiple heat settings too. I wish the geese trap were larger but not really an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Excited Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Great for NY apartment!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use at my grandsons apartment in Brooklyn. They love pancakes! I liked that the legs folded in for storage so it did not take up so much room. It heated evenly, cleaned easily and easy to use. For the price, I think a great solution when you don't want a big grill and storage is limited.
customer_reviews.author: The Traveling Nanny

customer_reviews.title: Average Griddle
customer_reviews.text: Had to bend the tabs for the tray to stay in place. It’s a safety issue if the tray falls out with bacon grease. Another thing is why is the tray on the opposite side of the griddle your working from makes no sense.
customer_reviews.author: Shoe

customer_reviews.title: Cooks Evenly - Cleans Beautifully
customer_reviews.text: After hunting for a replacement for our griddle, I settled on this product - and have certainly been very pleased, thus far! Cooked up a batch of pancakes - without using any oil, or greasing the surface at all - and had beautiful, evenly cooked pancakes, that slid off the cooking surface without a problem. Cleaning was a breeze!!
customer_reviews.author: Flying Kiwi

customer_reviews.title: Temp is not consistent throughout surface
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Cooks very unevenly. Temperature is not consistent on surface. Cooked 4 grilled cheese, one was burnt, 2 were cooked perfect and the last one was barely brown.
customer_reviews.author: tina drinka

customer_reviews.title: Love this Griddle
customer_reviews.text: Love this Griddle. Large enough to cook entire breakfast. Cleans easily with the large grease catcher and especially love that it is easy to store inside the pantry against the wall because it is very slim.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: An excellent griddle
customer_reviews.text: I like that the griddle has been so easy to clean. I do not use Pam because my last griddle burned and the burn stuck and could not be removed. Not so, with this griddle. I have been able to wash clean with soap and water and a cloth...no build up. The griddle also cooks evenly and the temperature is manageable..
customer_reviews.author: William A. Brackeen

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Griddle
customer_reviews.text: We love to griddle a lot and this is probably the third time we've purchased this brand. It seems we have to buy one every 5 years but for the price, this is a nice one. Haven't found a griddle yet that evenly distributes the heat 100% but this one comes pretty close. It's easy to clean too! Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Leila's Lass

customer_reviews.title: love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is GREAT! it is LARGE & low profile. I bought this for my dad who cooks breakfast for the grandkids every morning. They are so happy that their pancakes, eggs and bacon are all ready at once :) Am going to buy one for my house for Christmas morning breakfast :)
customer_reviews.author: T. Flores

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these that I used for two years of big family breakfasts, lunches and dinners. It finally wore out. I got another one. I am going to order another one because anything I like this much will go out of production. This is a great Griddle. I flat love it. Oh, if you use it on your stove top the warmer makes a great splash guard. No mess, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Gma

customer_reviews.title: Love the larger size!
customer_reviews.text: We have been looking for a large griddle for our family to use and this one is perfect and cheaper than other ones out there that are the same size!! We usually it almost daily and it is holding up really well. We can make 10 large pancakes on it or doing almost a whole loaf of bread for French toast! Also love that you can make a whole large flour quesadilla!
customer_reviews.author: Emily D.

customer_reviews.title: college bound
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my grandson who is off to college this year and he has sent me a photo of him and his friends cooking burgers on it. Made a great hit with him and that what grandmas are looking for. Definitely would order another one when my granddaughter leaves.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This griddle is great!
customer_reviews.text: We really love this griddle! The size gives you enough space to fully cook your entire meal in one setting, its easy to clean and heats up fast.
customer_reviews.author: Sunflower

customer_reviews.title: Nice Size But Limited Grease Capacity
customer_reviews.text: This griddle is large enough to fry an entire one-pound package of bacon in one pass (a few more strips than the average griddle). But two batches of bacon overflows the grease catcher - which is rather shallow due to the griddle’s low profile.
customer_reviews.author: TJM

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Yes the reviews are correct the heat distribution is not perfect but not too bad. I like it’s large grilling area and they designed it so it is easy to clean the plastic areas meaning there are not a bunch of thin inaccessible nooks for food and grease to get trapped in. I would buy this model again. Beware it is longer than standard cupboards are deep so be sure you have a good place to store it before you buy any large sized grill
customer_reviews.author: joe kingseed

customer_reviews.title: Huge griddle
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace another griddle we had that was pretty old and beat up. We have a large family and I love the amount of surface area on this griddle. I haven’t noticed any significant “hot spots” and I’ve used it multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: Chad B.

customer_reviews.title: Great griddle!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this griddle! Perfect size for a family. The others I looked at had such a small cooking area, not this one! Makes great pancakes! ....I love the way the griddle is slopped to the back for grease and the plastic catcher. I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Prichard

customer_reviews.title: Great appliance
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because it's just what I need to make certain types of meals. It's easy to clean and store. What I dislike is the grommets on the bottom legs are too small and they do not grip the tabletop surface very well; the griddle slides too easily. Other than that, it's a great product and I do recommend it to anyone who chooses to purchase this particular griddle.
customer_reviews.author: PAMMY

customer_reviews.title: Even heat - Excellent for pancakes, eggs, sausage - Very easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two griddles for Church Pancake Suppers. Tested both at home before use at church. Outstanding units! Plenty of smooth, even heat over entire surface. The size is perfect for quickly cooking lots of pancakes. The low sides make flipping pancakes, eggs and sausage very easy. Cleaning is very easy. Our Church Pancake Supper was a complete success. One person mixing batter and two cooking. We were able to easily keep up with the demand for pancakes!
customer_reviews.author: John L Rogers

customer_reviews.title: This is a solid 3. Really wanted the heat ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid 3. Really wanted the heat to be even. Heat is not even. using a non-contact infrared thermometer show the center area is lower by 25-30 degrees. here is a heat shield on the bottom, so I can see, but my guess is the element is a large oval, rater than 2 small ones, hence the center being too far away. I'll still use and you can too, just keep in mind the center is not going to be as hot.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Large cooking surface and sleek design
customer_reviews.text: This is a great griddle. My husband loves to make breakfast in the mornings and this is perfect. We usually go through a griddle at least every two years. This is by far the largest cooking surface we have found. It is sleek in design and perfect. Hope it lasts - only time will tell that.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Tozer

customer_reviews.title: Large surface and good quality construction of the griddle
customer_reviews.text: Large surface and good quality construction of the griddle. Only disappointment is quality of the drip tray. Very light weight and could be easy to tip if grease shifts while removing.
customer_reviews.author: PatKS

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this griddle. We bought it for our camper, and I like it so much that I am going to buy one to keep at home
customer_reviews.author: MC Jones

customer_reviews.title: Quirky but OK
customer_reviews.text: The sides tuck under the griddle to save space. Unfortunately, try cleaning the grill in the sink without the sides flopping about causing the grill to collapse into the sink.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.  No complaints.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product this morning. Made pancakes and eggs. Everything seemed to cook evenly and I'm happy. I followed the directions for cleanup and it was simple. 8 pancakes at one time. Much better than pulling out half a dozen pans on the stove. This will get used every weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I had been looking for. Large cooking area, easy to clean and legs fold under for nice storage but the legs a little flimsy for size also didn't like the control in the back of unit no way to tell the setting. Overall a good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Carter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome griddle
customer_reviews.text: The large surface makes cooking French toast, pancakes or anything else for a crowd a snap. The heat distribution seems consistent across the surface and it’s very easy to clean. I love the low profile that doesn’t take up too much space in my pantry. Best electric griddle I’ve ever purchased!
customer_reviews.author: SSK

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this griddle!
customer_reviews.text: This griddle came even better than described. It is larger and thinner than we expected to see, and the clean-up is amazingly fast and easy. It's really nice to be able to make a whole batch of pancakes at once then freeze them for later. I'd highly recommend this griddle!
customer_reviews.author: Angi H

customer_reviews.title: Great size without being unmanageable
customer_reviews.text: I love this griddle! The lips on the sides keep grease from flowing over the edges. Cooks pancakes beautifully. Able to cook 8 medium pancakes at a time. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sara H

customer_reviews.title: Big and nice
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and the convenience for cleaning it. The only thing that I will complain about it, is the short cord. I wish that I could be longer due to the whole idea is to be plugged in an outlet.
customer_reviews.author: DIANA

customer_reviews.title: The Ol' Griddle of 53yrs has an M S. (Maximum Smoke)
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a good griddle I down the Presto. Larger cooking surface and enjoy cooking several foods on it. Malted Pancakes, Shaved Steak and Omlits. Works very well and much easier than the Ol' aluminum griddle I had.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Peck

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't fold but it was very wide
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a folding griddle one that folds in half this says that it folds but it does not my daughter liked it but not as much as the other one she had it shouldn't say folding if it does not fold
customer_reviews.author: tam

customer_reviews.title: Warming tray issue
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for awhile and have noticed that the warming tray hangs away from the griddle. It doesn't keep my items warm. Am I doing something wrong? Otherwise the griddle works fairly well. Seems the center is cooler than the edges though.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl R. Oakland

customer_reviews.title: Major hot and cool spots
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this but the fact that Presto cheaped out with the heating element makes it impossible to get even heat distribution. If they would have put a more extensive heating element (which I would be happy to pay extra for quality) this would be a great griddle. It also warps when heated up so you can see it bowed in towards the middle. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Cliff

customer_reviews.title: Grill doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: The temperature control unit has a poor connection with the grill. A short circuit occurs and the grill turns off. When the controller is pressed by hand, the light starts to light up and the grill works, but it does not last long. The grill looks very good. The grill looks very good. Build quality is good. We are very upset that a bad one came to us, we can’t return because our friends sent it to us outside the United States. Why aren't they tested before selling?
customer_reviews.author: Niko

customer_reviews.title: Great size for many people and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: The temperature seems low but I have only used it twice so I'm in a learning curve.Very good size and works well,but not totally even heat, but to be expected.I love that I can cook enough for 5-6 people and everyone can eat at the same time.After using it for a couple of months i am glad I bought it,easy to clean and I usually leave it on high heat.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Have found when cooking pancakes I try to keep them in from the outside edges for more even cooking of the cakes.
customer_reviews.text: I like just about everything with this amazing griddle, like the way the handles fold for storage and to tilt it for grease to run off the cooking surface.Also I like the non-stick surface.
customer_reviews.author: Coop

customer_reviews.title: So great. My first griddle and wondering why I’ve never ...
customer_reviews.text: So great. My first griddle and wondering why I’ve never used one before. This works so even, I usually Cook bacon on one half and 6 eggs on other.
customer_reviews.author: John Kite

customer_reviews.title: Uneven heat, buy the smaller version
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the smaller version, this size has cold (cool) spots. (If you raise the temperature of the cold spots to the desired temperature, then you could call the other spots hot spots.) Either way, it results in uneven cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Love the slim
customer_reviews.text: Love the slim line, foldable design. It tilts and is so nice!
customer_reviews.author: R. S.

customer_reviews.title: Great size, but slow heat and flakey thermostat
customer_reviews.text: It takes twice as long to heat to temperature as a big griddle, which is a shame, since it is such a useful size. I have also have two thermostats that run 60 degrees high. The second one was good for a week and then shifted.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Chasko

customer_reviews.title: Slightly smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: We were trying to replace a griddle that we had used for years. This appeared to be it, it is close but not exactly what we had hoped for. The cooking surface is textured which is what we wanted but the whole griddle is a bit smaller than we had planned. Decent product for the money
customer_reviews.author: jsherwood58

customer_reviews.title: Great size and easy storage
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas gift for someone. However, I own this griddle which was purchased several years ago, and I love it! It is extremely useful and is so easy to store since it folds aways easily. I mainly use it for pancakes, and it does a terrific job.
customer_reviews.author: Customer from Alabama

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: It’s really big a lot bigger than I had expected. The design isn’t balanced and one leg doesn’t sit right on the surface. Disappointing really.
customer_reviews.author: WomanWithABrain

customer_reviews.title: Great griddle, perfect size for our small camper and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great griddle, perfect size for our small camper and folds up nice and compact. No issues so far, I really like it. The tilt feature is really handy when cooking greasy foods.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Turley

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product!
customer_reviews.text: This item was purchased as a replacement for another one (that was very old and didn't work well). Its' slimline design makes it easy to store away when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: KMG

customer_reviews.title: Love the size and shape of this griddle.
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and shape of this griddle. Just moved into new motor home and this works great on my stove top. Love the leg popup feature so it can drain the grease to the drip tray.
customer_reviews.author: GEORGIA GAL

customer_reviews.title: Easily stored
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size. Legs fold for easy storage with other large like cookie sheets, etc. Easy to clean because electrical unit is detachable.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri I Nemes

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: exactly what needed. Have used griddles all my life. Live the skim. Heat distribution and little lower in middle but I adjust my cooking. Still love it and would buy again
customer_reviews.author: CLAUDIA D. LITTTLE BARKER

customer_reviews.title: Best griddle I've owned so far
customer_reviews.text: Tons of space. Pretty consistent, even heat (it is a griddle, they have limitations😁). The non-stick surface seems to be holding up extremely well after heavy use. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jgalloway79

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great non stick griddle. Easy to clean, and love how the legs fold in to save space
customer_reviews.author: barb

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh...
customer_reviews.text: There is a heat shield on the back that rattled and make the product seem cheap, this in combination with the fact it was too big to store in any of my cabinets, I decided to return item.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Clingan

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have used thus twice in the 1st week I got it! I love it! Easy to clean and big enough to feed plenty of mouths and quickly. Sooo easy to clean and heat distribution is as expected and well distributed.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Waves

customer_reviews.title: I like it so much, I bought another!
customer_reviews.text: I make a huge breakfast every Sunday morning (eggs, potatoes, bacon, etc) and this griddle handles all of it!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: BARGAIN
customer_reviews.text: Love it , love it , love it! Completely non stick, and just so much easier! Thanks so much amazon! Would've paid an a and a leg going and getting this anywhere else ! Recommend this for sure! :)
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Guyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Pancake Griddle
customer_reviews.text: perfect replacement griddle and excellent for pancake. Heats very even and great temperature control. 5 star
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Terrance Nordmann

customer_reviews.title: I bought this item thinking that griddles should have non-stick ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item thinking that griddles should have non-stick surfaces...this one doesn't. Also, the plug is defective and light keeps going on and off...not coming anywhere near the temperature on the dial. At 350 degrees...I could touch the surface without a problem. While the style is ideal, what I need is something on which I can make pancakes and this failed the test.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Covey

customer_reviews.title: limited space
customer_reviews.text: I love that the legs fold under, Saves space in a small kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean
customer_reviews.text: We make pancakes every three or four days and this griddle works great. Eggs bacon and sausage do well on it, too. Heats evenly and the non-stick surface is a breeze to clean.
customer_reviews.author: BGP

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: This was one of my husbands Christmas gifts, as he is the “breakfast chef” and needed a new one terribly, and we love it. I even enjoy coming on it. So big so you can fit lots of bacon, pancakes, French toast or whatever it is you’re cooking. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Stacey vs

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT GET VERY HOT
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THE SIZE OF THE GRILL BECAUSE WE COOK OUR LUNCHES AT WORK; HOWEVER, IT DOES NOT SEEM TO BE HEATING TO THE DESIRED TEMPERATURE. HAD TO MOVE FOOD TO A HOTTER GRILL TODAY. WOULD LIKE TO REPLACE IT WITH A BETTER GRILL, BUT I HAVE THROWN AWAY THE PACKAGING. CAN YOU HELP ME WITH THIS.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela P. Yeatts

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last 2 years
customer_reviews.text: We bought this right before Christmas 2018 and it has worked great until this morning when it warped. Went to heat it up and I heard a crack then looked at the skillet and all of a sudden it was warped. One of the corners just twisted upwards. It's been amazing otherwise just kind of disappointed that I will now have to go buy a new skillet and it's not even been a full 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: mitchell baer

customer_reviews.title: Takes a while to heat up
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace my griddle and found this one to be easier to clean and store even though it's the same cubic inches. The only issue I have is it takes much longer to heat then my previous griddle. But I have adjusted and it's just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Lot's of room
customer_reviews.text: Love the low profile design. We have a perfect spot that it slides into. The large surface makes it easier to cook breakfast for the whole family at once so we can eat together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a great size for a family and they love it
customer_reviews.text: bought this as a gift for a family of 2 adults and 2 teens. It's a great size for a family and they love it!
customer_reviews.author: Redsender

customer_reviews.title: Large Surface
customer_reviews.text: This unit has a large cooking surface which I was looking for. Quality construction. I have used it only once. It gets hotter than my last griddle so I'll have to adjust to that. Otherwise I am glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: josh taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great griddle.
customer_reviews.text: This griddle is great! Folds down and up for easy storage and heats up nicely all over.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Heath

customer_reviews.title: The perfect griddle for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great size for family of 4. Took a while to heat up but did a good job cooking all of our food. I like that it is anodized and not teflon. Best of all, cleaning is a breeze! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Baui

customer_reviews.title: its huge way better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: this thing is huge,have not even used it yet I have no where to store it.bought it for my hubby and he loves it
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Williams

customer_reviews.title: Presto indoor electric griddle
customer_reviews.text: Great price for the money, big enough to make breakfast for the whole family. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Karl  Petrush

customer_reviews.title: Measure cabinet depth before purchase
customer_reviews.text: Wish i got a smaller one as this is too deep for my base cabinets so have to keep stored outside
customer_reviews.author: Allison G

customer_reviews.title: Took my pancake game to the next level. It ...
customer_reviews.text: Took my pancake game to the next level. It doesn't heat the middle as well as the edges, but it's a huge improvement over using a frying pan.
customer_reviews.author: charles_atx

customer_reviews.title: Surface temp does not correlate to dial
customer_reviews.text: First time using it. Surface temp measured 80 degrees hotter than the dial is set for. About a 10 degree variation depending on where on the surface the reading was taken.
customer_reviews.author: penchant

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Bought strictly for eggs.Got tired of sticking and broken yokes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Love the amount of real estate on this thing! That being said it doesn’t seem to cook as evenly as my last, smaller Presto griddle. Still worth it though.
customer_reviews.author: Christophor Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase, the griddle is a really nice size! Bigger than the average size griddle. It's pretty enough to use as a warmer on a buffet too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Wife loved the gift - very high quality and well made. Replaced her old griddle with this!
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to store and not clunky.
customer_reviews.text: The slim design makes it easy to put away and it doesn’t feel cheap. The best griddle we’ve owned so far
customer_reviews.author: George Casiano Jr

product_meta.title: Presto 07071 15-inch Electric Tilt-n-fold Griddle, Black
product_meta.description: Size:15"| Color:BlackGreat for every meal: breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Easily adjusts from a level cooking surface for eggs and pancakes to a tilted surface for meats. Legs fold in and drip tray locks in place for easy, compact storage. Heavy cast aluminum base with large 184-square-inch cooking surface. Premium nonstick surface ensures stick-free cooking and easy cleaning. Control Master heat control automatically maintains the desired cooking temperature. Slide-out drip tray empties easily. Easy to clean. Fully immersible with the heat control removed. Tilt to drain. Flip down the levers to tilt the grilling surface when cooking meats. Fold to store. Fits in most standard 18-inch kitchen cabinets. 120 volts AC, 1200 watts.
feature_bullets: Great for every meal: breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Easily adjusts from a level cooking surface for eggs and pancakes to a tilted surface for meats
Legs fold in and drip tray locks in place for easy, compact storage. Heavy cast aluminum base with large 184-square-inch cooking surface
Premium nonstick surface ensures stick-free cooking and easy cleaning. Control Master heat control automatically maintains the desired cooking temperature
Slide-out drip tray empties easily. Easy to clean. Fully immersible with the heat control removed
Tilt to drain. Flip down the levers to tilt the grilling surface when cooking meats. Fold to store. Fits in most standard 18-inch kitchen cabinets
